welcome_message_title: Welcome to Velilla de San Antonio
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Velilla de San Antonio, a charming Spanish city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious food, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Formerly known as the 'old terminal,' it now serves as a domestic and Schengen area terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main hub for Iberia Airlines, with a modern design and advanced technology.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for non-Schengen international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a login or registration.
